name: Pebble's Clicker
description:
Welcome to Pebble's Clicker, your mission is to defend your village against the evil's pebbles.

You could receive help from Taga's Team to upgrade your attack.

On your marks.. Ready? Click !

The project was made by

  • Florian Asencio : Program, Game Design, Game Art, Sound Design
Controls

Only the Left Click of your mouse.
